title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When I switch perspectives in Eclipse, the CVS repository view loses its maximized state.
EB: The CVS repository view should retain its maximized state when switching perspectives.
SR:
1. Open Eclipse in the Java perspective.
2. Open the CVS repository view.
3. Double click the title bar of the CVS repository view to maximize it.
4. Switch to the resource perspective.
5. Switch back to the Java perspective.
